messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] "whole-life unschooling"
messages.msgSnippet: Robyn, I was so GLAD to see you use this term!  I really dislike the term Radical Unschooling, as I don t really want to use the word radical to describe
messages.messageBody:
Robyn,
I was so GLAD to see you use this term! I really dislike the term Radical Unschooling, as I don't really want to use the word radical to describe myself (anyone who gets to know me will realize that I AM radical in many ways, but I just hate to ID myself w this word as it has been used against me as a put-down). So I am super thankful to have a this term to describe how I am raising my son. Thank you!
Millie
